The signers have faulted, so the funder shouldn't fund","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"}},"notifyFundingTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"This is considered a funder fault, and we revoke their bond","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"}},"notifySignerSetupFailure(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"We rely on the keep system punishes the signers in this case","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"}},"partiallySlashForFraudInFunding(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"called only by in _txOutputVector (0-indexed)","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block","_txIndexInBlock":"Transaction index in the block (1-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"},"return":"True if no errors are thrown"},"provideFraudBTCFundingProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint8,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify funding","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"Single bytestring of 80-byte bitcoin headers, lowest height first","_d":"Deposit storage pointer","_fundingOutputIndex":"Index of funding output in _txOutputVector (0-indexed)","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block","_txIndexInBlock":"Transaction index in the block (1-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"},"return":"True if no errors are thrown"},"provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_preimage":"The sha256 preimage of the digest","_r":"Signature R value","_s":"Signature S value","_signedDigest":"The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple","_v":"Signature recovery value"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"retrieveSignerPubkey(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"We store the pubkey as 2 bytestrings, X and Y.","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"returnFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"Returns the balance if insufficient. Always call this before distributing signer payments"},"revokeFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"Called only by notifyFundingTimeout"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"createNewDeposit(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"The system can spin up a new deposit"},"distributeSignerBondsToFunder(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Seizes signer bonds and distributes them to the funder"},"fundingFraudTeardown(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Deletes state after the funding ECDSA fraud process"},"fundingTeardown(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Deletes state after funding"},"getKeepPubkeyResult(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"get the signer pubkey for our keep"},"notifyFraudFundingTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract no funding proof was submitted during funding fraud"},"notifyFundingTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the funder has failed to send BTC"},"notifySignerSetupFailure(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that signing group setup has timed out"},"partiallySlashForFraudInFunding(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"slashes the signers partially for committing fraud before funding occurs"},"provideBTCFundingProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint8,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof to activate the deposit                             This is the happy-path of the funding flow. It means that we have succeeded"},"provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud during funding"},"retrieveSignerPubkey(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"we poll the Keep contract to retrieve our pubkey"},"returnFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Returns the funder's bond plus a payment at contract teardown"},"revokeFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Transfers the funders bond to the signers if the funder notifyFraudFundingTimeout(DepositUtils.D.notice: Anyone may notify the contract no funding proof was submitted during funding fraud

notifyFundingTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposi.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the funder has failed to send BTC

notifySignerSetupFailure(DepositUtils.De.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that signing group setup has timed out

partiallySlashForFraudInFunding(DepositU.notice: slashes the signers partially for committing fraud before funding occurs

provideBTCFundingProof(DepositUtils.Depo.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof to activate the deposit                             This is the happy-path of the funding flow. It means that we have succeeded

provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(DepositUti.notice: Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud during funding

retrieveSignerPubkey(DepositUtils.Deposi.notice: we poll the Keep contract to retrieve our pubkey

returnFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit st.notice: Returns the funder's bond plus a payment at contract teardown

revokeFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit st.notice: Transfers the funders bond to the signers if the funder never funds
